author: Matthew Tinn
comment: Latest version isn't reading the correct metadata tags for disc number. Fine on my PC's music player but in this app songs are listed as having no disc number. Slightly annoying when you have a 14 disc box set.  Only real issue. Otherwise one of the best music players on Android.

author: Pradeep N
comment: Best optimized, need some fixes like eliminating or un allow the duplicate files on the Playlist. Some songs are repeating on long play queue.

author: Enra
comment: Has amazing options, allowing for organization of audio files. Issues I have with the app is playing WAV files, reads "Cannot Play Song".

author: ANURAG MISHRA
comment: The music app is awesome and absolutely non comparable to any other music player... But the most important thing I wanna ask that can I save the music data permanently which I download....😅😅😅........

author: Thomas Audwin
comment: Couldn't run along browser these days recently which made the device hot, and restart a few times. As much as I believe that this wasn't the case before updates of the browser, this side should know a little bit of the details.

author: Mayur Pattar
comment: The latest version is much lagging in performance and we get those underlines for the fonts in home section. Hope SONY will fix it ASAP with another update. ✌🏻

author: Armita Asghari
comment: Everything is great except for one thing,everytime i edit the music info of my songs (name of the song,artist,album cover,etc) after a restart or just playing bunch of songs,the info gets reset to the way it used to be.

author: Nolan Pinto
comment: The latest update does not adapt the color of the Music Player in the notification shade to the color of the album art on devices running Android Oreo

author: Lester Lai
comment: did they revert the version back  9.3.11.A.0.3 because there is no updates and its better now

author: Christian Gyampomah
comment: Very good Music app 👍 but you should really add an option to clear the Play Queue
I like "Walkman" better than just "Music".
Would give 5 stars except podcasts don't show up even tho it's pictured in the preview pictures. What gives?

author: GJ Garuda
comment: This is very great app but I give only 4* since after the update the music artwork cannot be edited in the app anymore

author: Sankarshan Ramesh
comment: No option for deleting automatically created playlists

author: brij janani
comment: Loved newly smooky graphics in music info by gracenote, also loved almost transparent graphics in side menu.  Thank you Xperia.

author: Hunk Mate
comment: It will be a better app when you include cross-fading.

author: Thomas Lennard
comment: Was grate an then ads come on it now don't get inless you won't a video playing halfway through a song  in less they stop it

author: Owen Vratraski
comment: I love the new transition on sony music.. Hope you guys can make it straight to the future. I love Sony.

author: Mohamed Naveeth
comment: Best Music player I ever had Better then Music player.

author: Terminator 2008
comment: Why can't I add a song as a ringtone no more from this app?

author: Hieu Le
comment: Beautiful app, need a little improvement in speed

author: Vignesh Sarathy
comment: I cant find the casting option now after the update....please fix it

author: Sina Rahimi
comment: The best app in music category ❤
Is very very ok..😉☺i like it.

author: Akhil Noby
comment: Plz put back set as ringtone option.......😣🙋

author: Venedict Lee
comment: PLS have the speed feature and more themes

author: Dimas Penggalih
comment: Best Android music player!

author: अतेन्द्र सोनवानी
comment: World's best music player
Such a cool app for music

author: Ashan Sashika Fernando
comment: Great work #Sony_Xperia™

author: mk Khan
comment: Nice yaar
Best aap with... Clear bass

author: زوالفيصل بن راجالئ
comment: TOP

author: mohammad Mjz
comment: The play queue bar is lowered.

author: Osvaldo Gris
comment: Why messing w/some things that didn't need any change like stars? 4 THINGS: »It'd be awesome if you could enable some feature to hide undesired folders(like beta version) WhatsApp voice notes,for example. »PLEASE,bring back the Facebook LIKE BUTTON,miss it terribly. »We need a more intuitive way of managing favorites,perhaps mixing 'most played' & 'favorites' and create a new tab which could play our really most loved tracks. »ClearAudio+ doesn't make a big difference,FIX! Listen to us please. Keep it up 😉

author: Johnny Rodriguez
comment: Downloading Album Art while playing song is not working. Everything else is superb.

This should be the best music app there. However, it has an album art issue. I spend hours to resolve my album art - I put the right album and artist arts and all looks great. However, if the phone is turned off or restarted, all my hardwork is wiped and music returns to its original state even though on settings I indicated that it should never sync album art. I see this as a common theme in most reviews. Sony should address this because, this is otherwise the best music app I have used.

author: Guilherme Zanetti
comment: Sleep timer was an accurate feature! However, music quality isn't unique anymore - as it was with former Walkman players. Clear Audio means well, but it often varies the tune's volume, treble and low (it's quite annoying because the songs don't sound natural). The new appearance is attractive, and even the overall audio quality is the best I've ever listened, but it already has been better... I would suggest a careful approach to this matter, after all "it's all about Music".

author: keerthan mv
comment: No wonder this is the best music app in market. everything ia perfect except that the overall volume becomes low when playing bass heavy tracks I am not sure if this came in as a part of some software update. But it os really annoying. this happens only when i am using a Bluetooth earphones. I habe tried a few headphones but it's the same. the dac should be fine because the same track plays fine when I use a poweramp or neutron. Please look into this if you are reading this review, dear Sony....

author: Kristine Constante
comment: I love the download information and arts automatically as the music plays, the optomiser, resume viewing, autoplay and playlist. Also, it automatically categorise the songs. I love it. Somehow, Podcast is not featured in my new Sony phone anymore and there is no music 'art screen saver' or something that shows with the music. It makes me a little sad.  I hope I can see it again.
